definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
lit. three ignorant cobblers add up to a genius (idiom); fig. collective wisdom

definition: anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)/assimilation
composite number (i.e. not prime, has a factorization)

sentences.english: The route and experiments for synthesis of carbazole violet are described in detail.
sentences.chinese: 详细介绍了咔唑紫的合成路线及实验过程。

sentences.english: VOICE: So it sounds as if anabolic steroids can be very destructive.
sentences.chinese: 所以，听起来合成代谢类固醇的破坏性会很大。

sentences.english: Ene reaction is one of the simple and versatile reactions of organic synthesis in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 烯反应是新近被用于有机合成的简单而重要的反应。

sentences.english: Hydrolytic kinetic resolution(HKR) is an effective way for synthesis of chiral epichlorohydrin.
sentences.chinese: 是目前合成手性环氧氯丙烷的有效方法。

sentences.english: This color composite view was recorded under dark skies near Sydney, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 这张彩色合成影像是在澳洲的雪梨附近所拍摄。

sentences.english: The stuff in the sugar bowl. We’re not talking about complex carbohydrates, which are merely long strings of sugars.
sentences.chinese: 我们不讨论碳水化合物，那是一长串糖的合成物。

sentences.english: Coumarin has been synthesized in Perkinreaction of acetic anhydride and salicylaldehydecatalyzed by anhydrous potassium carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 用无水碳酸钾代替无水醋酸钠催化合成了香豆素。

sentences.english: A water-base drilling fluid that contains dispersed oil or synthetic hydrocarbon as an internal phase.
sentences.chinese: 分散的油滴或合成烃为内相的水基钻井液。

sentences.english: Complementary colors make white lights when two are mixed.
sentences.chinese: 当两种颜色混合时，互补色合成白光。

sentences.english: Maleic anhydride grafted polysulfone(PSF g MAH) was prepared.
sentences.chinese: 首先合成了马来酸酐接枝改性聚砜。

sentences.english: A seismic trace calculated from well -log data is called a synthetic seismogram.
sentences.chinese: 由测井资料计算出来的地震记录道称为合成地震记录。

sentences.english: This article presents a new synthetic method of Thioglycolic Acid— reducing method of iron.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种新的合成巯基乙酸的方法，即铁还原法。

sentences.english: Objective To research the synthesis method of Apraclonidine.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨安普乐定的合成方法。

sentences.english: Low-voltage dual frequency synthesizer for radio telephones.
sentences.chinese: 低电压无线电话双频率合成器。

sentences.english: Microporous Si-Ti pillared montmorillonite materials were prepared in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 合成了一种硅钛柱撑蒙脱土微孔材料。

sentences.english: The advances in the process technology for the enzymatic synthesis of cephalexin are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了酶法合成头孢氨苄的工艺方法研究进展。

definition: thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation
a derivative (complex product derived from simpler source material)
